item.title: Git Add, Git Commit and Git Push
item.description: How to add and commit changes in the and then push the changes to a remote repository (here GitHub) Outline of steps to be performed: Change some files or create some Issuegit add <name of files>command to add files to be committed Then commit them using git commit -am <commit message>, here a is for all files, m is for message, and then you place your message for the changes (optional) Finally, push the changes to a remote repository Let’s see this in action
